ol.title: To attach a file to your message:
ol.li: While viewing a message in the Compose window, next to Attachments, select Add/Edit. The Add/Edit attachments window appears.
Click Browse to browse to the directory containing the file, then double-click the file name. The file name appears in the Browse field.
Click Attach File. The attachment appears in the Attached File table and is added to your email message.

Repeat steps 2 and 3 to add more attachments.
Notes:
You can add up to five attachments to one message.
The size of an outgoing email message (including all attachments) should not exceed 10MB.
Click Done. The names of the files you have attached appear in the Attachments field.

Click Send. The Inbox folder appears with a message informing you that your message has been sent.
Notes:
If you have selected to save a copy of this message in the Sent Items Folder, be aware that you are also saving the attachments, impacting on your total disk usage number.
If your system is connected through a modem, after you click Send, the screen might not change until the attachments finish uploading.
